attributes.action: Create a pathway down bogs lane
attributes.additional_details: Not safe for families with young children to be walking on a road, around a corner with on coming vehicles. Somebody could really get hurt.
attributes.background: Create a public footpath down bogs lane in harrogate towards the railway bridge. Not safe for families with children and dogs to walk down when cars are coming really fast around the corner.

rejection.details:
Decisions about local footpaths is a matter for your local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
